name: US Census Economic Indicators
description: Daily US Census Bureau economic indicators

params.rawScript:
import requests
import os

API_KEY = os.getenv('CENSUS_API_KEY')

url = 'https://api.census.gov/data/timeseries/eits/resconst'
params = {
    'get': 'cell_value,data_type_code,time_slot_id,category_code',
    'key': API_KEY,
    'time': 'from 2023'
}

response = requests.get(url, params=params)
print(f'US Census API: {response.status_code}')

if response.status_code == 200:
    data = response.json()
    print(f'Records: {len(data) - 1} economic indicators')  # -1 for header row
    print('Sample data:')
    for row in data[1:6]:  # Show first 5 data rows
        print(f'  {row}')

print('Census data ingestion complete')
